author: Diana Haider
description: Kirschwasser, aromatised wine and sherry sit together harmoniously. I amended, to reduce the volume of serve and make a tad drier in January 2022. The previous recipe, served in a coupe: 60ml kirschwasser, 30ml aromatised wine, and 30ml PX sherry.
name: Mr Kappes
recipeIngredient: 15 ml Lillet Blanc (or other aromatized wine)

recipeInstructions.text: STIR all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
